Class Grid

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Grid

public class Grid
extends greenfoot.Actor

Grids contain all necessary information (i.e. fertility, moisture) for flora growth of any sort

Version:
Monday, October 21st, 2013
Author:
Daniel Chung

Constructor Summary
Grid(int gridNumber, int positionX, int positionY)
          Creates a grid with an index number, location, and image
 
Method Summary
 void act()
          Neutralises grid's moisture and fertility, depletes countdown timers for disasters (weather), and changes colour of grid to reflect status
 void changeFertility(double amount)
          Adds the input double amount of fertility to the nutrition level of the grid, but does not allow fertility to drop below zero
 void changeMoisture(double amount)
          Adds the input double amount of moisture to the moisture level of the grid
 void dry(double newNeutralMoistureLvl, int droughtTime)
          Causes grid to dry rapidly to a defined drought level of moisture, for a given number of turns
 void flood(double newNeutralMoistureLvl, int floodTime)
          Causes grid to moisturise rapidly to a defined flood level of moisture, for a given number of turns
 double getFertility()
           
 double getMoisture()

Grid

public Grid(int gridNumber,
            int positionX,
            int positionY)
Creates a grid with an index number, location, and image

Parameters:
int - gridNumber The index number of the grid
int - positionX The horizontal position of the grid
int - positionY The vertical position of the grid
Method Detail

act

public void act()
Neutralises grid's moisture and fertility, depletes countdown timers for disasters (weather), and changes colour of grid to reflect status

Overrides:
act in class greenfoot.Actor

changeFertility

public void changeFertility(double amount)
Adds the input double amount of fertility to the nutrition level of the grid, but does not allow fertility to drop below zero

Parameters:
double - amount The amount of fertility to add to the nutrition level of the grid

changeMoisture

public void changeMoisture(double amount)
Adds the input double amount of moisture to the moisture level of the grid

Parameters:
double - amount The amount of moisture to add to the moisture level of the grid

dry

public void dry(double newNeutralMoistureLvl,
                int droughtTime)
Causes grid to dry rapidly to a defined drought level of moisture, for a given number of turns

Parameters:
double - newNeutralMoistureLvl The drought level of moisture
int - droughtTime The number of turns that the the drought will last

flood

public void flood(double newNeutralMoistureLvl,
                  int floodTime)
Causes grid to moisturise rapidly to a defined flood level of moisture, for a given number of turns

Parameters:
double - newNeutralMoistureLvl The flood level of moisture
int - floodTime The number of turns that the the flood will last

getFertility

public double getFertility()
Returns:
double The level of nutrients currently stored in this grid

public double getMoisture()
Returns:
double The level of moisture currently stored in this grid
